CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Income_Frequency__c ,"Weekly"), AnnualIncome__c *52, IF(ISPICKVAL(Income_Frequency__c ,"Fortnightly"), AnnualIncome__c *26, IF(ISPICKVAL(Income_Frequency__c ,"Monthly"), AnnualIncome__c *12, IF(ISPICKVAL(Income_Frequency__c ,"Annually"), AnnualIncome__c *1,0))))
CustomField.label: Annual Base Income
